name: Lumber (eclair-desertire)
description:
Hi! This is the simulator of lumberjack,  just chop down trees and upgrade your axes, relax. I only started my road to game developer and made my first clicker game!

Special thanks to designers and its icons that i used:

https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/reset - Reset icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/upgrade - Upgrade icons created by Smashicons - Flaticon
